name: Five Nights At Rowdy's: HTML5 EDITION
name_original: Five Nights At Rowdy's: HTML5 EDITION
description:
- Info -
Five Nights at Rowdy's is Comedic Point and Click Five Nights at Freddy's Fangame and is not meant to be taken seriously.
- Story -
Local Family Household "Rowdy's" is in desperate need of a night guard and hires you for the position, however the animatronics inside seem to have sinister intent after hours, check cameras, close doors, and wind the music box all on limited power to survive the night.
